title: Detox
cleaned_text:
WHO NEEDS TO DETOX? EVERYONE!



So why does everyone need to detox? Because we are all exposed to a massive amount of toxins from our environment, and particularly from vaccines. Almost all health disorders stem from inflammation in the body from toxic exposures (synthetic chemicals, radiation, etc). Our bodies can only process and filter a certain amount of toxins before a health issue will develop. What health issue develops is determined by genetics and how much toxicity we can handle is also determined by genetics. But genetics alone CANNOT create a health issue in a once-healthy person — there needs to be a trigger. Vaccines are often that trigger because of the high level of toxins injected into the body at one time.

The ingredients in the vaccine, particularly heavy metals like mercury, barium, and aluminum, usually head straight to the brain causing neurological damage like autism, speech delays, Alzheimer’s, etc. Although once in the brain, they travel down the lymphatic system to the gut. And sometimes they end up elsewhere as well. For example, aluminum has been found in muscle tissues causing myopathy and in arthritic joints and in bones causing osteoporosis.

The toxic effects of vaccines many times are visible immediately, particularly as a skin issue (rash, hives, eczema, etc). Sometimes the effect can be severe like in seizures, for example, and will start right away. Other times, the toxins will accumulate in the body. Each new vaccine will cause further damage. And eventually, the body will reach a state of over-toxicity and a health issue will develop. It can be such a gradual change that it may all seem ‘normal’ as it manifests as allergies or asthma, but this is NOT normal. No matter whether you visibly see the effects or not, vaccines carry toxins that can have profound effects on your health, either directly after the vaccine or in the longer term.
